nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.name: onlyOwner

devdoc.details: The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control functions, this simplifies the implementation of "user permissions". Provides onlyOwner modifier, which prevents function from running if it is called by anyone other than the owner.

constructor.details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

devdoc.title: Ownable
